reviewText: I could not be happier! The DVDs were still shrinkwrapoed. They are perfect.

Decided to bite the bullet and buy this as my local P(athetic) Broadcasting Station stopped showing it and Amazon Prime pulled it. Glad I did. Much better video quality than my local broadcast!  Also the vendor was fairly local to me so it showed up in two days!

We came across this show on PBS and were hooked.  I wanted to see it from the beginning so ordered the series.  We love being able to pick the episodes we feel like watching.  Great acting on all parts!
I thoroughly enjoyed this series!  This is one of my favorite shows--I love British humor! Thank you so very much!
I liked the series so much on PBS that I just needed to get my own library. I really liked Geoffrey Palmer for his 'deadpan' humor and thought Judi Dench was terrific in series as well.
